value.title: Reuse Power Query Steps to clean multiple workbooks - Power BI Tips & Tricks #43
value.excerpt: In today's video I will show you how to reuse Power Query steps to clean multiple workbooks.  In a previous video, I showed you how to reuse power query steps to clean multiple workbooks (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rohXtAlIgqY) and some of you asked me if it was possible to reuse the power query

value.title: Running totals in power query??? Yes, you can :)
value.excerpt: In today's video, I am going to show you how you can do running totals or cummulative totals in Power Query, but do this only if you have no way to do it using DAX.  Also, I will show you how List.Range work, really cool function :)  Here you can download all the pbix files: https://curbal.com/donwload-center

value.title: Schedule data downloads / exports in Power BI
value.excerpt: You can export data or download data out of Power BI in many different ways and depending on the source, you can schedule refresh those data dumps too.   In this video, I will give you one example on how to do that.  Other resources mentioned in this video: Export data with DAX Studio: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-Gfgnk6R0Qw

value.title: Scrape data from multiple pages on a website with Power BI Desktop - Power BI Tips & Tricks
value.excerpt: Have you come across a website that has data you need but it is presented in multiple pages? Downloading page by page can be frustrating and time consuming. In this short video, I will show you how to iterate multiple pages on a website to import the data using Power BI.  LINK to NFL site: http://www.nfl.com/stats/categorystats?tabSeq=2&offensiveStatisticCategory=TEAM_PASSING&conference=ALL&role=TM&season=2015&seasonType=REG

value.title: Set up Query Parameters to avoid hardcoded paths
value.excerpt: With the release of the April update (2016), Power Bi allows the use of parameters and in this video I will show you how to configure them to avoid using hardcoded paths when connecting to file sources in your computer.  Link to the previous video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JER0QXmL34k   Looking

value.title: Store data from PowerApps in sql, approve it in flow and use it in Power bI

value.title: The wrong answers to 30 common Power BI interview questions 2022
value.excerpt: There are multiple websites that offer Power BI interview questions and answers and after reviewing them, I have collected 30 common Power BI interview questions that have wrong answers and together we will figure out what the right answer is.  Join me and lets clarify those topics once and for all!

value.title: Trim/ remove spaces in a text column Power Query - Power BI Tips & Tricks #29

value.title: Update Power BI Desktop automatically
value.excerpt: In today's video I will show you how to install power bi desktop so you get automatic downloads every time the power Bi team releases a new version.  The great thing about this is that you dont need to have administrator rights on your computer to get the download. Great if you are a big company right?

value.title: Convert data from HTML to Plain Text using Power Query for Power BI Table Visualization
value.excerpt: As we all know, Power BI table visualization does not support HTML generation. So, we need to convert our HTML text to Plain text.
